data.expected_result: Like on desktop, enough space is given beside each number so that the hyphens line up.
data.short_description: The width of the numbers in the expanded view of an Audit log message pushes the hyphen a bit to the right.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create an invite (or do anything that gives you multiple lines/numbers in the expanded view of that Audit message). - Open Audit log. - Expand the message that talks about you creating the invite. - Compare the position of the hyphen beside 01 and 02.
